text: and will cut him in two and appoint his portion with the hypocrites.Notice that the Lord consigns hypocrites to hell. That servant pretended to be faithful while the owner was around, but as soon as he turned his back… There, there will be weeping and gnashing of teeth.This is a servant who had gained his master's confidence, but then betrayed it—he winds up in hell. He was director of food services, and if he had been faithful there he would have been promoted to general director (verse 47), but…
